key_facts: Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev called oil and gas a 'gift of God'.
Aliyev defended fossil fuel expansion at COP29.
UN Secretary General António Guterres called fossil fuel reliance 'absurd'.
Guterres emphasized the urgency of limiting global warming.
The UK pledged to reduce emissions by 81% by 2035.
The UK urged other countries to match its climate ambition.
Concerns exist that Azerbaijan is using COP29 to promote oil and gas.
COP29 is chaired by a former oil executive.
Discussions at COP29 focus on climate finance for poorer nations.
There are calls for a $1 trillion global climate finance fund.
Deadly floods and extreme heat are driving urgent climate action.
Global calls for decarbonization and adaptation are increasing.
